server.definition: SELECT act_vrsn_tbl.* FROM act_vrsn_tbl WHERE obslt_utc is null AND act_id IN ( SELECT ACT_ID FROM ACT_PTCPT_TBL WHERE (ROL_CD_ID IN ('61848557-d78d-40e5-954f-0b9c97307a04','02bb7934-76b5-4cc5-bd42-58570f15eb4d','ac05185b-5a80-47a8-b924-060deb6d0eb2') AND ENT_ID = $placeid$) OR (ROL_CD_ID = '3f92dbee-a65e-434f-98ce-841feeb02e3f' AND ENT_ID IN (SELECT src_ent_id FROM ent_rel_part_dsdl_tbl WHERE REL_TYP_CD_ID = '455f1772-f580-47e8-86bd-b5ce25d351f9' AND ent_rel_part_dsdl_tbl.obslt_vrsn_seq_id is null and trg_ent_id = $placeid$)) )
